revision.text:
A '''Fire Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Fire-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn |- | Charmander || | Cyndaquil || Torchic |- | Growlithe || | Slugma || |- | Ponyta || | Houndour || |- | Vulpix || | Magby || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Cinnabar Island || | 1000 Quest Points |} {{Eggs}}

revision.comment: Fire Egg (could only find 1 fire type so guessing its only Torchic for Hoenn)
